Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item is not just an object but a solution tailored to enhance your experience significantly. Given its unique features and high-quality standards, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I am offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $20000. This is an opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
